articles.title: KPA General Staff Warns against Any Interception of Satellite
articles.content:
KPA General Staff Warns against Any Interception of Satellite
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The General Staff of the Korean People's Army in an important report on Thursday warned that if hostile forces take any slight move to intercept the DPRK's satellite for peaceful purposes, the KPA will make a prompt just retaliatory strike at it.
					 The report said:
					
					 It is the Japanese reactionaries, the sworn enemy of the Korean people, who are perpetrating the most evil doings over the DPRK's projected satellite launch for peaceful purposes.
					
					 It is a legitimate right of a sovereign state in which no one can interfere to use space for peaceful purposes and the above-said satellite launch is a just work for the prosperity of the country and the nation and progress of humankind.
					
					 Prompted by this, the DPRK has already accessed to the international treaties on space and on March 21 sent cable notices on the issue of banning access to air space to be exposed to danger during the time the launch is expected to the civil aviation authorities concerned including those of the U.S., Japan, Russia, China, Switzerland and south Korea which control or use the relevant air space.
					
					 The relevant countries are now taking necessary measures after accepting the working steps taken by the DPRK in line with the international regulations and usage.
					
					 However, only Japan is making much ado as if something serious had happened, finding fault with even the DPRK's above-said advance notice and terming the launch of "Kwangmyongsong-2," the DPRK's experimental communications satellite for peaceful purposes, a "hostile act."
					
					 Kongo and Choukai, guided-missile destroyers of the Japanese aggressor forces and the destroyer Great King Sejong of the south Korean puppet navy have already been deployed in the East Sea of Korea.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries, bereft of elementary reason, declared it as a state policy to "intercept" the satellite if the DPRK launches it.
					
					 The KPA General Staff solemnly declares as follows to cope with the prevailing situation:
					
					1. If Japan recklessly "intercepts" the DPRK's satellite for peaceful purposes, the KPA will mercilessly deal deadly blows not only at the already deployed intercepting means but at major targets.
					
					2. The U.S. should immediately withdraw its already deployed armed forces if it does not wish to be hurt by the above-said strike as DPRK clarified its stand on its projected satellite launch for peaceful purposes.
					
					3. The south Korean puppet bellicose forces should refrain from disturbing the said launch, the pride of the nation, while currying favor with their U.S. and Japanese masters.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Kang Hyon Jin
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Kang Hyon Jin
Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il Thursday sent a wreath to the bier of the late Kang Hyon Jin, candidate academician, professor and doctor of the DPRK State Academy of Sciences, expressing deep condolences over his death.

articles.title: Funeral of Late Hong Song Nam Held
articles.content:
Funeral of Late Hong Song Nam Held
Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The late Hong Song Nam, chief secretary of the South Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and concurrently alternate member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK and deputy to the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, was accorded a state funeral here on Thursday. 
					 Present there were members of the state funeral committee including Kim Yong Nam and Kim Yong Chun, officials concerned and members of the bereaved family.
					
					 Before the start of the funeral procession members of the state funeral committee and members and relatives of the bereaved family paid silent tribute to him. 
					
					 Amid the playing of a dirge the funeral cortege left for the burial site at 8 a. m.
					
					 A funeral service was held at the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery on the outskirts of Pyongyang.
					
					 A condolatory address was made by Choe Thae Bok, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK.
					
					He said that Hong single-mindedly remained boundlessly loyal to President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il all his life and was loved and respected by the Party members and other people for his spirit of devoted service to the country and its people, the revolutionary principle and modest personality.
					
					 His life was a worthy one as he had the greatest honor of being a revolutionary soldier and glorified it thanks to the deep political trust and loving care of the Party and the leader, the speaker noted, adding that the people of the DPRK would remember him for having devoted his life to the strengthening and development of the Party and the victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche. 
					
					 The remains of the deceased were buried in the grave. 
					
					 A wreath sent by Kim Jong Il was placed there. 
					
					 Also laid there were wreaths from the C. C., the WPK, the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, the DPRK Cabinet and other units.
					
					  The participants in the funeral paid silent tribute to the deceased.

articles.title: Congratulations to Latvian Prime Minister
articles.content:
Congratulations to Latvian Prime Minister
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Il, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, sent a congratulatory message to Valdis Dombrovskis on March 31 on his appointment as prime minister of the Latvian Republic.
					 The message wished him success in his responsible work in the future.

articles.title: Congratulations to Foreign Minister of Latvia
articles.content:
Congratulations to Foreign Minister of Latvia
Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun sent a congratulatory message to Maris Riekstins on March 31 upon his appointment as foreign minister of Latvia. 
					 The message expressed belief that the relations between the two countries would develop on good terms in the future and wished him success in his new job.

articles.title: Foreign Diplomats Visit Minsok Street in Sariwon
articles.content:
Foreign Diplomats Visit Minsok Street in Sariwon
Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Officials in charge of cultural and friendly relations of embassies of different countries here visited Minsok (Folk) Street in Sariwon City, North Hwanghae Province, on April 2 on the occasion of the 16th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					 Being briefed on the fact that Minsok Street was built in a peculiar style thanks to the noble intention of Kim Jong Il to properly carry forward and develop the national cultural heritages, the guests looked round the exhibition of historical materials and the folklore amusement ground and other places vividly showing the excellent folk tradition of the resourceful and diligent Korean people.
					
					 A councilor of the Romanian embassy here said that Minsok Street was built in a peculiar and splendid style, adding that the visit to the street offered him an opportunity to know better about the history and folk tradition of Korea. 
					
					 Riyad Shehadeh, councilor of the Palestinian embassy here noted that the Korean people are the great people with a long history and brilliant culture, adding that he was deeply moved by the Korean people's efforts to preserve the national character.

articles.title: State Academic Degrees and Titles Awarded to Intellectuals
articles.content:
State Academic Degrees and Titles Awarded to Intellectuals
Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- State academic degrees and titles were awarded to the intellectuals who have contributed to the prosperity of the country by achieving successes in the scientific researches and the education of youngsters on the occasion of the Day of the Sun. 
					 An awarding ceremony was held on April 1. The title of candidate academician was awarded to Kim Yun Sik, room chief of the Academy of Agricultural Science, and Jang U Jin, researcher at the Academy of Social Sciences. 
					
					 Professorship went to Rim Jong Won, department head of 
					
					Kim Il Sung University, Kim Yun Chol, department head of Kumsong School, and others.
					
					 Doctorate was conferred upon Yun Yong Chol, teacher at Kim Chaek University of Technology, Ok Jin Song, teacher at Sariwon College of Geology, Ri Sang Gwon, rector of Pyongyang University of Printing, Pak Chun Gwang, researcher at the State Academy of Sciences, and others. And assistant professorship went to 72 persons.

articles.title: Remembrance Meeting Held
articles.content:
Remembrance Meeting Held
Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- A remembrance meeting of officials and creators in the field of art creation titled "The immortal leadership provided by the great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung in guiding the erection of the Chollima Statue" took place at the Grand People's Study House on Thursday on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 Present there were Kim Song Min, chairman of the Central Committee of the Artists Union of Korea, and others.
					
					 At the meeting U Ung Ho, head of a creative group of the Mansudae Art Studio, and others who took the floor looked back with deep emotion on the unforgettable days when the Chollima Statue was towering as a monumental masterpiece in the era under the care of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 They told stories that the President gave origin to the historic Chollima Movement and made sure that a great leap forward was effected in socialist construction to stun the world people and, at the same time, unrolled a plan for erecting a monument symbolic of the era of Chollima and gave perfect answers to all the questions arising in the project.
					
					 It is thanks to the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il who is glorifying the undying exploits of the President that the Chollima Statue is shedding more brilliant rays as the monument of the era and is inspiring the servicepersons and people in their efforts to bring about great innovations, a great leap forward as successors to the tradition of a great surge, they stressed.
					
					 They renewed their resolution to bring about a leaping advance in erecting monuments and creating art works representing the era of Songun.

articles.title: New Stamps Issued
articles.content:
New Stamps Issued
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- New stamps (two kinds of sheetlets) were brought out in the DPRK in commemoration of the China 2009 World Stamp Exhibition.
					 Printed on the upper parts of the sheetlets are the letters "China 2009 World Stamp Exhibition" in Korean and English.
					
					 One sheetlet gives stamps reflecting chrysanthemum and peony in the centre and the other sheetlet stamps reflecting the Taesong Hall of Songgyungwan, relics in Kaesong area of Korea and Baima (white horse) Temple, relics in Luoyang City, Henan Province of China.

articles.title: Ideological and Theoretical Exploits in Developing Juche Philosophy
articles.content:
Ideological and Theoretical Exploits in Developing Juche Philosophy
Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il issued the famous work "On Some Questions in Understanding the Juche Philosophy" on April 2, 35 years ago.
					On this occasion, the Korean people are looking back with deep emotion on the ideological and theoretical exploits of Kim Jong Il in glorifying the Juche philosophy as the revolutionary philosophy of the era of independence. 
					
					In his work, he makes it clear that the Juche philosophy is a man-centered philosophy and fundamentally differs from human philosophy.
					
					The Juche philosophy raises the fundamental question of philosophy by regarding man as the main factor and elucidates an outlook on the world, a viewpoint and attitude towards the world by focusing on man.
					
					Human philosophy is a philosophy of life which denies the inherent mission of philosophy as a science that gives an outlook on the world and mainly interprets what man and life are.
					
					The fundamental question of the Juche philosophy does not purely concern the human question, but the relations between man and the world; the principle of the Juche philosophy does not merely represent an outlook on human life, but an outlook on the world.
					
					It also regards man as an independent, creative and conscious social being in the outlook of man.
					
					Kim Jong Il fully expounds questions of principle arising in understanding the Juche philosophy such as the question of correctly understanding the outlook and viewpoint on and stand towards the world clarified by the Juche philosophy and the question of having a correct understanding of the essential features of man.
					
					In his work, he says: The Juche philosophy newly elucidated the essential features of man and his position and role as dominator and transformer of the world, and thus raised his dignity and value to the highest level possible. This is the great achievement of the Juche philosophy that no other philosophical thougths have accomplished.
					
					The revolutionary theory of the leader can serve as a guiding principle of the revolution and construction, not losing its vitality, only when it is steadily developed in depth in compliance with the requirements of the times and the developing revolution. 
					
					Kim Jong Il strictly defended the purity of the Juche philosophy founded by President Kim Il Sung and glorified it as the revolutionary philosophy of the present times and definitely turned it into a weapon of struggle of the popular masses by publishing such famous works as "The Juche Philosophy Is an Original Revolutionary Philosophy" and "On Having a Correct Viewpoint and Understanding of the Juche Philosophy".
					
					The slogan "Let Us Live Our Own Way!" vividly reflects the strong independent spirit of the Korean people firmly armed with the Juche philosophy.
					
					The Korean people will solve all the problems arising in the revolution and construction their own way and endeavor more vigorously for the accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche, cherishing the high pride of holding Kim Jong Il, a great ideologist and theoretician, in high esteem.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Escalated Confrontation with Compatriots Flayed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Escalated Confrontation with Compatriots Flayed
Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Minju Joson today in a signed commentary accuses the Lee Myung Bak group of more frantically escalating the confrontation with compatriots and the maneuvers to invade the north while crying out for its participation in the PSI under the pretext of the DPRK's projected satellite launch.
					 The DPRK's projected satellite launch was prompted by the desire to further develop the nation's ultra-modern science and technology and contribute to the prosperity common to the nation and humankind, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 This notwithstanding, the Lee group is mulling the participation in the PSI. This is, in the final analysis, a criminal scenario to ignite a war against compatriots by cooperating with foreign forces in their moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK.
					
					 The Lee group's projected participation in the PSI is an undisguised provocation to the DPRK and a declaration of a war of aggression against it. 
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will never overlook the Lee group's reckless maneuvers to invade it and escalate the confrontation with it but take prompt retaliatory measures against them.
					
					 The Lee group would be well advised to act with discretion, bearing in mind that its participation in the PSI would aggravate the military stand-off on the Korean Peninsula and spark off a war.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats Performed in Leading Movement for Reunification to Shine Forever
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats Performed in Leading Movement for Reunification to Shine Forever
Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The great efforts made by President     Kim Il Sung all his life for the sake of the  country and the nation and the feats performed by him in the sacred cause of achieving the country's reunification and independence will shine forever in its history. Rodong Sinmun Thursday says this in a signed article. 
					 It is the great exploits performed by Kim Il Sung in the cause of national reunification that he gave steady continuity to the said cause by consistently maintaining the line of one Korea, the line of reunification, and laid down the three charters for national reunification, providing a strong mainstay for achieving national independence and reunification, the article notes, and goes on: 
					
					 The divided Korean nation should be reunified as one without fail. The issue of national reunification should be settled by the Koreans themselves according to their wishes and will free from foreign interference under any circumstances. This is the quintessence of the above-said line consistently maintained and implemented by Kim Il Sung in the whole course of the struggle to accomplish the cause of national reunification. 
					
					 The above-said three charters are a reunification programme common to the nation the keynote of which are the  three principles of national reunification, the 10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo.  
					
					 The President deemed it a principle of great national unity to subordinate everything to the cause of national reunification irrespective of ideology, political view and religion and helped whoever desirous of national reunification take the road of reunification and patriotism with his immensely broad-minded magnanimity and tolerance. 
					
					 Grand festivals for reunification and pan-national rallies took place with fellow countrymen in the north and the south and abroad attending and the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification representing the will of all fellow countrymen for reunification was formed. The patriotic forces for reunification in different places in the north and the south and abroad have grown to be a driving force and are united closer than ever before under the banners of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration. All these developments would be unthinkable without the indefatigable leadership provided by the President for strengthening the forces for reunification.
					
					 The above-said feats are the immensely precious legacies bequeathed by the President to the Korean people and nation and solid assets for accomplishing the cause of national reunification.  
					
					The President's distinguished and seasoned leadership over the movement for national reunification has been creditably carried forward by General Secretary Kim Jong Il who is identical to the President in the idea, leadership art and personality.

articles.title: Joint Air Attack Exercises Staged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Joint Air Attack Exercises Staged in S. Korea
Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers conducted a large-scale joint air attack rehearsal in the area of Mungyong, North Kyongsang Province on March 31, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 Involved in the rehearsal were over 30 helicopters of various types, including Apaches of a special brigade under the 2nd operation command of the puppet army, the 21st wing of the puppet forces and the U.S. 2nd air combat brigade stationed in south Korea.
					
					 The warmongers got hell-bent on the frantic war rehearsal for making surprise air strike on someone's vantage position and dropping a special unit to occupy it.
					
					 The puppet warmongers prattled that this joint war rehearsal marked an occasion for increasing the capability of a joint operation of ground and air-support units.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the Lee Myung Bak puppet bellicose forces, preoccupied by a wild ambition to stifle the DPRK at any cost, are rendering the situation extremely strained by staging another anti-DPRK war exercises before the disappearance of powder smoke by the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Czech Party Leader
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Czech Party Leader
Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- A meeting of the Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Czechoslovak Communist Party took place in Prague on March 26 on the occasion of the 16th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 Miroslav Stepan, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Czechoslovak Communist Party, said at the meeting that the august name of President Kim Il Sung revered by the world is shining along with the DPRK's history of revolutionary struggle and the history of the international labor movement.
					
					 The President's cause is being successfully carried out by Kim Jong Il, the general secretary said, and went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il has wisely led the revolution and construction by pursuing the unique Songun politics to cope with the changed international situation.
					
					 The Korean people have firmly defended socialism and dynamically accelerated socialist construction, foiling all sorts of provocative moves of the U.S.-led imperialists by pursuing the Songun politics. 
					
					 The validity of the Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il has been proved more clearly than ever before as it fully meets the requirements of the present times.
					
					 The Czechoslovak Communist Party will as ever fully support the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people in their efforts to build a great prosperous and powerful nation and achieve the country's reunification. 
					
					 The general secretary wholeheartedly wished Kim Jong Il big success in his work for building a thriving country and achieving national reunification.

articles.title: WPK's Just Cause Supported in Greece
articles.content:
WPK's Just Cause Supported in Greece
Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The DPRK ambassador to Greece paid a courtesy call on Aleka Papariga, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Greece, on March 20.
					 The general secretary hoped that the Korean people would achieve bigger successes in their efforts to build socialism and achieve the country's reunification and in their struggle against imperialism under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The general secretary said that the economic crisis sweeping the world at present goes to prove that socialism alone is a genuine society guaranteeing a worthy life of the working masses.
					
					 The general secretary reiterated that the Communist Party of Greece would invariably support the just cause of the Workers' Party of Korea defending socialism and emerging ever-victorious, not yielding to the imperialists' threat of aggression but frustrating their moves to stifle the DPRK.

articles.title: Centenary of Birth of Kim Il Sung to Be Commemorated in Mongolia
articles.content:
Centenary of Birth of Kim Il Sung to Be Commemorated in Mongolia
Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- A Mongolian preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated with due ceremony at the building of the Federation of Peace and Friendship Organizations of Mongolia on March 27.
					 Ch. Surenjav, chairman of the Mongolia-Korea Friendship Society, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 Its action program to be carried out until 2012 was made public at the ceremony.
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to conduct in the capital city and localities such colorful political and cultural events as meeting, art performance and photo and handcraft exhibition praising the undying feats performed by the President in developing the friendly relations between the two countries and accomplishing the human cause of independence and widely introduce the greatness of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: Informacion importante del Estado Mayor General del EPC
articles.content:
Informacion importante del Estado Mayor General del EPC
Pyongyang, 2 de abril (ATCC) -- En su declaracion importante publicada el dia 2, el Estado Mayor General del Ejercito Popular de Corea subrayo que pasaria inmediatamente al justiciero ataque de represalia si las fuerzas hostiles dan el mas minimo movimiento para "interceptar" el satelite pacifico de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					 El texto del documento sigue abajo:
					
					 Los que se portan de la peor manera en cuanto a los preparativos de nuestro pais para lanzar un satelite artificial con fines pacificos son los reaccionarios japoneses, enemigos jurados del pueblo coreano.
					
					 Utilizar el espacio en fines pacificos es un derecho legitimo de los Estados soberanos, en el cual nadie puede intervenir, y el lanzamiento de nuestro satelite con fines pacificos es una labor justa para la prosperidad del pais y la nacion y el progreso de la humanidad.
					
					 Por esta razon, nuestro pais ingreso ya en los tratados internacionales del cosmos y remitio el telegrama de aviso relacionado con el cierre de las areas espaciales peligrosas durante el plazo previsto para el lanzamiento a las autoridades de la aviacion civil de Estados Unidos, Japon, Rusia, China, Suiza, el Sur de Corea, etc. que controlan y usan sus respectivas areas.
					
					 Ahora, esos paises toman medidas necesarias aceptando las medidas de trabajo que adopta nuestro pais de acuerdo con las reglas y costumbres internacionales.
					
					 Japon es el unico que arma escandalos como si pasara algo desastroso censurando hasta el mencionado aviso previo de nuestro pais y calificando de "accion hostil" el lanzamiento del satelite piloto de comunicaciones "Kwangmyongsong- No. 2" con fines pacificos.
					
					 Ya fueron emplazados en el Mar Este de Corea los destructores dotados de cohetes teledirigidos de las fuerzas navales agresoras de Japon, "Kongo" y "Choukai", y el otro del ejercito titere surcoreano "Gran Rey Sejong".
					
					 Los reaccionarios japoneses, que perdieron la mas elemental razon, declararon como su politica estatal la "interceptacion" de nuestro satelite cuando el mismo fuera lanzado.
					
					 Frente a esta grave situacion, el Estado Mayor General del EPC declara solemnemente lo siguiente:
					
					 1. Si Japon comete la imprudencia de "interceptar" nuestro satelite pacifico, el EPC abrira implacable y rotundo fuego contra los medios interceptores desplegados ya y otros blancos importantes.
					
					2. Ya que EE.UU. expuso claramente su posicion en cuanto al lanzamiento de nuestro satelite pacifico, debe evacuar a sus fuerzas armadas emplazadas si no quiere sufrir danos.
					
					3. Los belicistas titeres surcoreanos no deben incurrir en acciones que obstaculizan el lanzamiento de nuestro satelite, que deviene un orgullo nacional, en su aduloneria a sus amos norteamericano y japones.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il envia ofrenda floral al feretro de difunto Kang Hyon Jin
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il envia ofrenda floral al feretro de difunto Kang Hyon Jin
 Pyongyang, 2 de abril (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il envio el dia 2 una ofrenda floral ante el feretro del difunto Kang Hyon Jin, candidato al academico, profesor titular y doctor de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, en senal de profundas condolencias por su fallecimiento.

articles.title: Tienen lugar funerales de difunto Hong Song Nam
articles.content:
Tienen lugar funerales de difunto Hong Song Nam
Pyongyang, 2 de abril (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar este jueves en esta capital los funerales con honor estatal del difunto Hong Song Nam, miembro suplente del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, diputado a la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Hamgyong del  Sur.
					  Al acto asistieron Kim Yong Nam, Kim Yong Chun y otros miembros del Comite Funerario Estatal, los funcionarios correspondientes, los familiares y parientes del difunto.
					
					  Antes de la partida del feretro, los reunidos guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria de Hong.
					
					  A las 8 de la manana, partio el feretro mientras se interpretaba el canto funebre.
					
					  Se efectuo la ceremonia de despedida en el Cementerio de Patriotas situado en el suburbio de la ciudad de Pyongyang.
					
					  La oracion funebre estuvo a cargo de Choe Thae Bok, miembro suplente del Buro Politico y secretario, del CC del PTC.
					
					  El orador senalo que Hong fue infinitamente fiel durante toda su vida a su Lider y su Dirigente y los militantes del partido y los habitantes lo adoraban y respetaban mucho por su espiritu de servicio abnegado por la patria y el pueblo, fidelidad a los principios revolucionarios y modestia.
					
					 Subrayo que toda su vida fue la orgullosa de un soldado revolucionario que tuvo el honor mas grande y la vida mas valiosa gracias a la gran confianza politica y el amor del partido y el lider.
					
					 Destaco que todos los coreanos no olvidaran a Hong quien dedico toda su vida por el fortalecimiento del partido y la victoria de la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					  Acto seguido, fueron enterrados los restos mortales de Hong.
					
					  Fue depositaba al pie de su tumba la ofrenda floral enviada por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					  Tambien, fueron colocadas las otras a nombre del CC del PTC, el Presidium de la APS de la RPDC, el Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC y otras unidades.
					
					  Los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria del difunto.

articles.title: Conferidos grados academicos y categorias docentes a intelectuales
articles.content:
Conferidos grados academicos y categorias docentes a intelectuales
Pyongyang, 2 de abril (ATCC) -- Con motivo del Dia del Sol (15 de abril, cumpleanos del  Presidente Kim Il Sung) fueron conferidos los grados academicos y las categorias docentes a los intelectuales quienes lograron exitos en la investigacion cientifica y la labor docente para las generaciones venideras y contribuyeron a la prosperidad de la patria.
					  En la ceremonia de entrega efectuada el dia primero fueron otorgados el titulo del Candidato a Academico a Kim Yun Sik, jefe de seccion de la Academia de Ciencias Agricolas, y a Jang U Jin, investigador de la Academia de Ciencias Sociales.
					
					  Tambien, fueron condecorados la categoria docente del Profesor titular a Rim Jong Won, jefe de catedra de la Universidad Kim Il Sung, Kim Yun Chol, jefe de la catedra de la Escuela Kum Song, y otros, el grado academico del Doctor a Yun Yong Chol, profesor de la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek, Ok Jin Song, profesor de la Universidad Geologica de Sariwon, Ri Sang Gwon, rector de la Universidad de la Industria Poligrafica de Pyongyang, Pak Chun Gwang, investigador de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias, etc. y la categoria docente del Candidato a Profesor Titular a 72 personas.
